alert.note: Alert for Laurens; Southern Spartanburg; Union (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 9:29PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Laurens, southeastern Spartanburg and west central Union Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 929 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles northeast of Laurens, or 9 miles southeast of Woodruff, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Laurens, Clinton, Gray Court, Woodruff, Cross Keys, Cross Anchor, Sedalia, Enoree and Ora. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
